info.gridworld.maze

Class MazeBug2

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • info.gridworld.actor.Bug
        • info.gridworld.maze.MazeBug
          • info.gridworld.maze.MazeBug2

  • public class MazeBug2
extends MazeBug
    A MazeBug2 can find its way in a maze.
    The implementation of this class is testable on the AP CS A and AB exams.
